## AlternativeVerticalsProps.getSuggestionUrl property

A function to provide user defined url path for vertical and universal sugestion links.

Defaults to "/\[verticalKey\]?query=\[query\]" for vertical links and "/?query=\[query\]" for universal links.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSuggestionUrl?: (data: VerticalLink | UniversalLink) => string;
```
